long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Amazon Price Tracker is a powerful Chrome extension designed to monitor prices of products listed on Amazon.in. 
Users can effortlessly add product links to track, enabling them to stay informed about price fluctuations over time. 
The extension regularly updates and consolidates current prices, highlighting changes such as increases or decreases. 
You get alerts too whenever your favourite product's price drops!
This intuitive tool centralizes price monitoring, providing users with a convenient way to manage and optimize their online shopping decisions on Amazon.in.
